thread.title: Curly Hair Solutions Teams Up With Trade Secrets At This Years National Womens Show
thread.title_full: Curly Hair Solutions Teams Up With Trade Secrets At This Years National Womens Show - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Curly Hair Solutions Teams Up With Trade Secrets At This Years National Womens Show
text:
Curly Hair Solutions® will partner with Trade Secrets to showcase the entire Curl Keeper Styling Collection at the National Women’s show in Toronto October 16h-18th 2015.
Toronto,ON (PRWEB) October 13, 2015
Curly Hair Solutions® is thrilled to be a part of the National Women’s show this coming October in Toronto, an exhibition featuring the newest products and services to hit the market for women. With over 450 exhibitors to choose from, Curly Hair Solutions® couldn’t be more excited to unveil their recent partnership with Trade Secrets, a leading Canadian beauty retailer. Curly Hair Solutions® and Trade Secrets will be teaming up to showcase the entire Curl Keeper® Styling Collection. Some highlights from the collection include: The award winning, Curl Keeper® Original, for total frizz control , Curl Keeper® Beach mist, for a blast of ocean air, Curl Keeper® Styling Cream, for tamable curls, and much more!
This year marks the 11th anniversary for the CHS team as an exhibitor at the National Women’s show. It also marks the first year of their partnership with Trade Secrets, a one stop beauty shop offering a large range of salon services, the latest in hair, nail, and skin products, and a variety of quality cosmetics that suits everyone’s beauty needs.
Jonathan Torch, the founder of Curly Hair Solutions® and the Curl Keeper® Styling Collection, will be located at booth #1006 with his expert curly hair team. They will be offering a variety of services such as expert styling tips, product demonstrations, and exclusive show deals. Experience the ultimate girls-day-out this October with the Curly Hair Solutions® team!
For more information about the Curly Hair Solutions® full line of hair care products including the Curl Keeper® Styling Collection, visit http://www.frizzoff.com .
What: Curly Hair Solutions® at the National Women’s Show
When: Friday October 16th from 11am – 8pm, Saturday October 17th from 10am – 6pm and Sunday October 18th from 10am – 5pm
Where: Metro Toronto Convention Center (South Building) 222 Bremner Boulevard, Toronto, Ontario
How: Tickets can be purchased here .
About Curly Hair Solutions: Curly Hair Solutions® and Curl Keeper® Styling Collections are curly hair products that perform 100% of the time, on every curly head, in all weather conditions, without the use of silicones. Our ingredients are natural, biodegradable and are not tested on animals. Our products have been perfectly pH balanced to match our environment to our bodies resulting in healthier, shinier, and a more controllable result every time.
 //www.prweb.com/releases/CurlyHairSolutions/NationalWomensShow/prweb12953241.htm
